name: obligated
content:
be, feel, etc. obligated

to be forced to do something or feel that you must do something: Subjects are not obligated to complete the survey. I always felt a little obligated to have my hair cut at my friend's salon. He laid out some product brochures in front of them saying, "But don't feel obligated." Related word
obligateSynonym
obliged
